pet_details.name: Buddy
pet_details.description: Buddy is a friendly Golden Retriever who loves playing fetch and meeting new people. He's looking for a home where he can get plenty of exercise and love.

pet_details.name: Whiskers
pet_details.description: Whiskers is a calm and curious tabby cat. She enjoys sunbathing and gentle cuddles. Perfect for a family or a single pet parent looking for a relaxed companion.

pet_details.name: Polly
pet_details.description: Polly is a vibrant parrot with a cheerful personality. She loves mimicking sounds and would thrive in a home that appreciates her playful nature.
